segments.text: Have you heard who got elected ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our new President is John McCain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? You can ’ t be serious !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was just as shocked when I found out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why would anyone vote for McCain ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don ’ t like that , then you ’ re probably going to be mad at what I tell you next .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was just joking , and Obama is our new President .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you serious this time ? That ’ s wonderful news .
segments.speaker: S2
